tool.name: SC3 calculate consensus

param.name: sc3_kmeans
param.label: SC3 object with stored kmeans clustering

param.name: input1
param.label: An output directory in which to write clusters and marker genes

tool.help: ============================================================ This function calculates consensus matrices based on the clustering solutions contained in the kmeans item of the sc3 slot of the metadata(object). ============================================================ It then creates and populates the consensus item of the sc3 slot with consensus matrices, their hierarchical clusterings in hclust objects, and Silhouette indeces of the clusters. It also removes the previously calculated kmeans clusterings from the sc3 slot, as they are not needed for further analysis.
